TopicTitle: Make "Quit to main menu" specify " Save & Quit"

Articles.Content:
It's a little niggle, but my heart skips ever so slightly in KSP as it's not made obvious if autosave is time based or based on the quit to menu button. As far as I can see, it does save when I quit to menu, but nowhere does it state this, so it's a bit strange.

Is it helpful for it to say "Save and Quit" on the button now instead?
I would be in favour of this It's a small thing, but it's also incredibly easy to fix (just a matter of changing the string put on the button)
